Reviews.Title: “Casual hotel, great location close to central station, darling harbour”
Reviews.Author: AudreyandMax
Reviews.Content: stayed 1 night arrived 930am friendly guy check bc ready basic decor tv fairly comfy bed clean double shower air con main road quiet pub downstairs couple drinks upstairs breakfast self serve toast cereal coffee etc wantedneeded staff leave bags bar late flight melbourne hotel affordable stay sydney cbd 5 minute walk chinatown recommend glasgow arms hotel remembered engaged opera house weekend sydney
